custom-action.name: dynatracemonitoring
custom-action.description:
The DynatraceMonitoring Action will get metrics from Dynatrace and send NeoLoad computed ones. The list is available at: https://github.com/Neotys-Labs/Dynatrace
Possible parameters are: - dynatraceId (required): Dynatrace ID (section of your Dynatrace saas url). Default value is "Dynatrace ID". - dynatraceApiKey (required): Dynatrace API key Default value is "Dynatrace API key.". - tags (optional): Dynatrace tags. Links the NeoLoad computed data to Dynatrace tags (format: "tag1,tag2"). Default value is "tag1,tag2". - dynatraceManagedHostname (optional): Hostname of your managed Dynatrace environment. - dataExchangeApiUrl (required): Where the DataExchange server is located. Typically the NeoLoad controller. Default value is "http://localhost:7400/DataExchange/v1/Service.svc/". - dataExchangeApiKey (optional): Identification key specified in NeoLoad. - proxyName (optional): The NeoLoad proxy name to access Dynatrace.
